code:
flowchart TD
    Start([Simulator Integration]) --> SelectSim{Simulator Type?}
    SelectSim -- Sensor --> SensorSim[Sensor Simulator]
    SelectSim -- Central Server --> CentralSim[Central Server Simulator]
    SensorSim --> CheckSensorDeps[Check Sensor Simulator Dependencies]
    CentralSim --> CheckCentralDeps[Check Central Server Dependencies]
    CheckSensorDeps --> InstallSensorDeps[Install Python/Dependencies]
    CheckCentralDeps --> InstallCentralDeps[Install Server Dependencies]
    InstallSensorDeps --> ConfigSensor[Configure Sensor Connection]
    InstallCentralDeps --> ConfigCentral[Configure Server Endpoints]
    ConfigSensor --> StartSensor[Start Sensor Simulator]
    ConfigCentral --> StartCentral[Start Central Server Simulator]
    StartSensor --> SensorRunning{Sensor Running?}
    StartCentral --> CentralRunning{Central Running?}
    SensorRunning -- Fail --> TroubleshootSensor[Troubleshoot Sensor]
    CentralRunning -- Fail --> TroubleshootCentral[Troubleshoot Central]
    TroubleshootSensor --> StartSensor
    TroubleshootCentral --> StartCentral
    SensorRunning -- Pass --> ConnectApp[Connect Z Monitor to Sensor]
    CentralRunning -- Pass --> ConnectApp
    ConnectApp --> TestConn[Test Connection]
    TestConn --> ConnOK{Connection OK?}
    ConnOK -- Fail --> CheckConfig[Check Configuration]
    CheckConfig --> ConnectApp
    ConnOK -- Pass --> VerifyData[Verify Data Flow]
    VerifyData --> DataOK{Data Flowing?}
    DataOK -- Fail --> TroubleshootData[Troubleshoot Data]
    TroubleshootData --> VerifyData
    DataOK -- Pass --> RunIntegTests[Run Integration Tests]
    RunIntegTests --> TestsPass{Tests Pass?}
    TestsPass -- Fail --> FixIntegration[Fix Integration Issues]
    FixIntegration --> RunIntegTests
    TestsPass -- Pass --> MonitorStatus[Monitor Integration Status]
    MonitorStatus --> Ready[Simulator Integration Ready]
    Ready --> End([Integration Complete])
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
